title: How to Make a Raspberry Revival Juice

steps.headline: Prepare and chop the pineapple and apples.
steps.description: Twist the leaves off of the pineapple and cut off the skin. Get yourself three slices and chop the apples into small pieces.

steps.headline: Use the juicer with the apples.
steps.description: Pour the juice into the blender.

steps.headline: Add the pineapple slices to the blender.
steps.description: Plop the raspberries into the blender as well.

steps.headline: Measure and pour the tincture into the blender.
steps.description: This type of tincture is a nutrient and rich formula. It is designed to replenish the body with vitamins and minerals.

steps.headline: Serve into a glass and enjoy.

text: Prepare and chop the pineapple and apples. Twist the leaves off of the pineapple and cut off the skin. Get yourself three slices and chop the apples into small pieces. Use the juicer with the apples. Pour the juice into the blender. Add the pineapple slices to the blender. Plop the raspberries into the blender as well. Measure and pour the tincture into the blender. This type of tincture is a nutrient and rich formula. It is designed to replenish the body with vitamins and minerals. Blend everything for about 10 seconds.  Serve into a glass and enjoy.
